item.title: By: Karla Landrum
item.dc:creator: Karla Landrum
item.description: Glad I caught the RT on twitter of this one. Congrats on getting MVP. Rodney and I hope to meet you at the Summit. Will you be attending the Friends of RedGate dinner? It is a MUST, they always do it up nice for everyone. Cheers, Karla @karlakay22
item.content:encoded: Glad I caught the RT on twitter of this one. Congrats on getting MVP. Rodney and I hope to meet you at the Summit. Will you be attending the Friends of RedGate dinner? It is a MUST, they always do it up nice for everyone. Cheers, Karla @karlakay22
